name: Frog Stack (KingGold, madMuck, yarnottc7892)
description:
Frog Stack is a Isometric puzzle game involving the stacking of frogs in their natural lily environment.

Controls:

WASD - Move the player

E - Shoot tongue

F - Place Frog
